headline: Is Huntington Stock Still Attractive After Recent Rally And Digital Banking Investments In 2025
summary: If you are wondering whether Huntington Bancshares is still a smart place to put fresh cash, or if most of the upside has already been priced in, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about its value today. Despite a modest dip of around -0.1% over the last week, the stock is still up about 11.5% over the last month, 9.2% year to date, and 12.0% over the past year. This hints that the market is steadily warming to its story after total gains of 45.5% over 3 years...

headline: Huntington Bancshares (HBAN): Revisiting Valuation After a 12% One-Month Share Price Rebound
summary: Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) has quietly delivered a solid run this month, outpacing the broader regional bank group. With the stock up around 12% over the past month, investors are starting to revisit the story. See our latest analysis for Huntington Bancshares. That recent 11.5% 1 month share price return has helped Huntington claw back some of this year’s earlier wobble. With the stock now at 17.74 dollars, the 5 year total shareholder return of 76.31 percent hints that investors still see...
